section.title: Description
section.p: This class provides a mechanism to associate a record with multiple diagnoses. Rather than have the traditional "primary diagnosis", "secondary diagnosis", etc. in a record, the record will contain a zero-to-many pointer to this class, which then has a one-to-one pointer to a diagnosis, with a precedence property to indicate primary, secondary, tertiary, etc.

stentry.p: Provides an indication of whether the diagnosis is primary, secondary, tertiary, etc.
Indicates the diagnosis associated with this entry in the list.
